title: Options
custom_preconds:
Clicking on the 3 dot menu icon next to personnel in this status will display the following options a user can select from:

Send BGC Consent Form

Mark Exempt

Upload BGC Consent Form

Send DT Consent Form

Resend DT Consent Form

Upload DT Consent Form

Add Comment

View/Edit Profile
custom_steps:
Assuming a user has International checked in the left hand nav, they are able to see the following 3 dot menu items in the correct format: 

Send BGC Consent Form

Mark Exempt

Upload BGC Consent Form

Send DT Consent Form

Resend DT Consent Form

Upload DT Consent Form

Add Comment

View/Edit Profile
custom_expected:
Actions: International

· Send BGC Consent Form
· Mark Exempt
· Upload BGC Consent Form
· Send DT Consent Form – Displays when DT= “NO”
· Resend DT Consent Form – Displays when DT=”YES”
· Upload DT Consent Form
· Add Comment
· View/Edit Profile

title: Options
custom_preconds:
List of Drop Down Menu Actions that an admin can take within this status to begin/continue the background check process. 

Additional Details:
This status includes any personnel that have been marked exempt by the BOC Admin or sometimes personnel that have only been sent for a Drug Test.  Additionally, while the flow from one status to another should operate mainly on an automated basis, there are still additional actions a user can take within each status. 

Please note: Status actions are for totality. Not all of them should be shown for every person. For example, if the BIGS Admin hasnt sent a DT form to personnel, then the “Resend DT Form” action should not be visible and etc.
custom_steps:
Clicking on the 3 dot menu icon next to personnel in this status will display the following options a user can select from:

Resend BGC Questionnaire

Upload BGC Consent Form

Send DT Consent Form

Resend DT Consent Form

Upload DT Consent Form

Move from Exempt to other status

Add Comment

View/Edit Profile
custom_expected:
Results depending if Exempt = DT "Yes"or Exempt DT "No"

· Resend BGC Questionnaire
· Upload BGC Consent Form
· Send DT Consent Form
- DT Yes – All displays except for “Send DT Consent Form”
· Resend DT Consent Form –
- DT No - All displays except the “Resend DT Consent form”
· Upload DT Consent Form
· Move from Exempt to other status
· Add Comment
· View/Edit Profile

title: Options
custom_preconds:
List of Drop Down Menu Actions that an admin can take within this status to begin/continue the background check process. 

Additional Details:
This status displays personnel who have completed their questionnaire and still need to complete their background check consent form. Additionally, while the flow from one status to another should operate mainly on an automated basis, there are still additional actions a user can take within each status. 

Please note: Status actions are for totality. Not all of them should be shown for every person. For example, if the BIGS Admin hasnt sent a DT form to personnel, then the “Resend DT Form” action should not be visible and etc.
custom_steps:
Clicking on the 3 dot menu icon next to personnel in this status will display the following options a user can select from:

Exempt

Upload BGC Consent form

Upload DT Consent form

Resend BGC Consent form

Send Additional Consent Form

Send DT Consent Form

Resend BGC Questionnaire

Resend DT Consent Form

Add Comment

View/Edit Profile
custom_expected:
If the BIGS Admin hasn't sent a DT form to personnel, then the “Resend DT Form” action should not be visible.

If the BIGS Admin has sent a DT form to personnel, then the “Send DT Consent Form” action should not be visible.

title: Options
custom_preconds:
List of Drop Down Menu Actions that an admin can take within this status to begin/continue the background check process. 

Additional Details:
This status includes personnel with Drug Test Outstanding, U.S. and Internationally. Additionally, while the flow from one status to another should operate mainly on an automated basis, there are still additional actions a user can take within each status. 

Please note: Status actions are for totality. Not all of them should be shown for every person. For example, if the BIGS Admin hasnt sent a DT form to personnel, then the “Resend DT Form” action should not be visible and etc.
custom_steps:
Clicking on the 3 dot menu icon next to personnel in this status will display the following options a user can select from:

Resend DT consent form

Upload DT Consent Form

Upload BGC Consent Form

Send Additional Consent Form

Upload BGC Consent Form

Add Comment

View/Edit Profile

Assuming a user has DT Consent Pending checked in the left hand nav, they are able to see the following 3 dot menu items in the correct format: 

Resend DT consent form

Upload DT Consent Form

Upload BGC Consent Form

Send Additional Consent Form

Add Comment

View/Edit Profile

title: Options
custom_preconds:
List of Drop Down Menu Actions that an admin can take within this status to begin/continue the background check process. 

Additional Details:
This status includes any personnel with a completed Background Check. Additionally, the BIGS Admin rarely goes into this status to perform additional actions but the actions listed below should still be available. 

Please note: Status actions are for totality. Not all of them should be shown for every person. For example, if the BIGS Admin hasnt sent a DT form to personnel, then the “Resend DT Form” action should not be visible and etc.
custom_steps:
Clicking on the 3 dot menu icon next to personnel in this status will display the following options a user can select from:

Upload DT Consent Form

Send DT Consent Form

Resend DT Consent Form

Mark Exempt

Upload BGC Consent Form

Send Additional Consent Form

Resend BGC Consent Form

Add Comment

View/Edit Profile
custom_expected:
Assuming a user has Complete checked in the left hand nav, they are able to see the following 3 dot menu items in the correct format: 

Upload DT Consent Form

Send DT Consent Form

Resend DT Consent Form

Exempt

Upload BGC Consent Form

Send Additional Consent Form

Resend BGC Consent Form

Add Comment

View/Edit Profile
